channel.title: Make command doesn't work
channel.description:
I'm trying to install a tar.gz package and it tells me to:
[code]./configure make make install[/code]
However when i do [code]make[/code] it gives an error saying something along the lines of make command doesn't exist, if you want it install it.
How do i fix this? I can't find anything called make under apt-get.

item.title: Make command doesn't work
item.dc:creator: NoobAssassin
item.description:
I’m trying to install a tar.gz package and it tells me to:

./configure make make install

However when i do make it gives an error saying something along the lines of make command doesn’t exist, if you want it install it.

How do i fix this? I can’t find anything called make under apt-get.

Read full topic
